# Marais Roos - Web Design Portfolio

> "I make clean, fast, low-BS websites for humans."

## Summary
Marais Roos is a web designer and developer based in South Africa. With a background in Electronic Engineering and Informatics, he runs a one-man studio bridging the gap between logic and creativity. He specializes in Next.js development and low-code solutions.

## Quick Links
- Portfolio: https://www.maraisroos.co.za/projects
- About: https://www.maraisroos.co.za/about
- Contact: https://www.maraisroos.co.za/contact

## Tech Stack
- **Code:** Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Sanity CMS
- **Design & Low Code:** Figma, Webflow, Framer
- **Automation:** Zapier, Resend

[Link to Full Context]: https://www.maraisroos.co.za/llms-full.txt
